short_summary: Investigation of Hydrogen Effects on Mechanical and Toughness Properties of Pipeline Steels
full_summary:
================================
### Tender Title
Investigation of Hydrogen Effects on Mechanical and Toughness Properties of Pipeline Steels

### Tender Details
* **Reference Number**: cb-25-64612936 (amended 1 time)
* **Solicitation Number**: NRCan-5000080098
* **Publication Date**: February 29, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 14, 2024 (14:00:00)
* **Amendment Date**: March 14, 2024

### Tender Specifications
The solicitation notice describes the investigation of the effects of hydrogen on mechanical and toughness properties of pipeline steels. 

### Contract Details
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 25, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2026
* **Contracting Entity**: Natural Resources Canada (NRCan)
* **Contracting Entity Location**: 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E4
* **Contact Information**: Roya Ayam (613) 000-0000 | Roya.Ayam@NRCan-RNCan.gc.ca

### Tender Status and Advantages
This is an Advance Contract Award Notice, which means that the contractor has already been selected and contract has been awarded. 

### Classification and Eligibility
* **UNSPSC Code**: 41122000 (Laboratory or sampling syringes)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Worldwide
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Attachments and Additional Information
Please find the tender notice attachment [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33154/acan--181314--5000080098.pdf) for more details.  _______________________________________________________________

See attached for the sample output.
